Install the ISOLDE plugin using the ChimeraX Toolshed as instructed on the [ISOLDE installation web page](https://tristanic.github.io/isolde/download/index.html).

1.  Open ChimeraX.
2.  In the ChimeraX menu, go to *Tools* → *More Tools*.
3.  The ChimeraX Toolshed will open in a new window.

::: {#fig-isolde layout-ncol="2" layout-valign="bottom"}
![ChimeraX Toolshed](../assets/chimerax-toolshed.png){#fig-toolshed}

![ISOLDE install button](../assets/isolde-install.png){#fig-isolde-install}

Installing the ISOLDE plugin in ChimeraX (*Click image to enlarge*)
:::

4.  Click on the ISOLDE button (Fig. 4.1 a).
5.  In the resulting window that opens, click on the Install button (Fig. 4.1 b).
6.  Wait for the download and installation to complete. A message will appear in the ChimeraX log when the installation is done.
7.  To use ISOLDE, go to *Tools* → *General* → *ISOLDE*.
